data.title: Bugay Victor Fedorovich
data.meta_description: Bugay Victor Fedorovich – was born in 1949 in Krasnodar, Russia. He graduated from the Krasnodar Art School, then the V.I. Surikov Moscow State Art Institute named after him in 1982. Mentors: B.A. Dekhterev. Artist, teacher, poet. He works in various genres, but the landscape is especially close to him. He worked as a teacher of painting in the art school of the Zheleznogorsk city, Kursk region since 1982. Member of the Union of Artists of Russia since 1991. Works are kept in private collections in Russia and abroad. Major works: the project "Kuban in Faces", and the book "Road" (2016). Participated in numerous exhibitions and competitions.
data.text:
The return of works of art purchased in our Gallery or online store is possible within 14 (fourteen) days from the moment of receipt.

Return conditions:

Artwork must be returned in the same condition as it was at the time of purchase. If the work of art was framed, then this rule also applies to the frame of the painting. Artwork must be returned in its original packaging unless it was damaged in shipping.
